name: Hydro Hilichurl Rogue
desc:
"Razorwave Roamer" Hydro Hilichurl Rogue

Hilichurl wanderers unaffiliated with any specific tribe. They can often be found roving the wilds as if in voluntary exile.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> .
If an opposing character has <color=#ffffff>Frozen</color> or <color=#ffffff>Mist Bubble Prison</color> attached, this character gains 1 <color=#ffffff>Energy</color> . (Once per Round)
<color=#ece5d8>Frozen</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
Character cannot use Skills. (Lasts until the end of this Round)
When this character receives <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> or <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> , removes this effect and increases DMG taken by 2.
<color=#ece5d8>Mist Bubble Prison</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>Character cannot use Skills.</color> (Lasts until the end of this Round)

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 3 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> . Creates 1 <color=#ffffff>Mist Bubble Slime</color> in your Hand.
(Characters with <color=#ffffff>Mist Bubble Slime</color> equipped can use the Technique: <color=#ffffff>Bubble Battle Tactics</color> )

<color=#ffd780>Equipment Card</color>
<color=#ffffff>Technique:</color> Bubble Battle Tactics
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>
(A character can only equip 1 Technique at a time)

<color=#ffd780>Technique</color>
(Prepare for 1 turn) Deals 1 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> , attach <color=#ffffff>Mist Bubble Prison</color> to opposing character.
<color=#ece5d8>Mist Bubble Prison</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>Character cannot use Skills.</color> (Lasts until the end of this Round)

Applies Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>] Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Bloom</color> : DMG+1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

Applies Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Energy</color>
Characters must consume Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.
When characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 Energy.
<color=#ece5d8>Technique</color>
When the active character is equipped with a Technique card, they can use the corresponding Technique.
Using a Technique counts as a Combat Action. If the character is unable to use Skills due to conditions like Frozen, Petrification, or Stun, they are also unable to use the Technique.
Using a Technique is not considered as using a Skill. Therefore, it cannot trigger effects such as "After using a skill" or "After the character triggers an Elemental Reaction." Damage dealt by using a Technique is not considered Damage dealt by the character.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

customize.name: Hydro Hilichurl Rogue
customize.desc:
"Razorwave Roamer" Hydro Hilichurl Rogue

Hilichurl wanderers unaffiliated with any specific tribe. They can often be found roving the wilds as if in voluntary exile.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Roamings of a Hydro Hilichurl Rogue

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow~" "Among the hilichurls, there are those whose way of being even the proudest of cats might view with admiration. Tall and aloof as they wander about the wilderness, their solitary silhouettes cut somewhat lonely figures..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Hydro Hilichurl Rogue" starts with 2 Energy.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Hydro Hilichurl Rogue's Test

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow!" "When they encounter unknown warriors or ferocious animals in the wild, Hydro Hilichurl Rogues will often use their scythes to quickly test out their opponents before they decide to commit themselves fully to the fight. Even cats would have trouble getting to grips with the speed and dexterity with which they wield their scythes..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Hydro Hilichurl Rogue" starts with 2 Energy. "Stonehide Lawachurl" starts with the Talent Card "Stonehide Reforged" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

Go around — the way ahead is the realm of the "king."

value.name: Hydro Hilichurl Rogue
value.desc:
Hilichurl wanderers unaffiliated with any specific tribe. They can often be found roving the wilds as if in voluntary exile.
They may also lend their aid to other hilichurls or hilichurl tribes for various reasons and go their separate ways afterward. They seem to possess a higher level of intelligence than commonplace hilichurls.
